task_1_feedback.product_name: Expected: High-Performance Laptop, Found: Industrial-Grade HVAC Air Filter
task_1_feedback.dimensions: Expected: 35.8x24.6x1.8 cm, Found: 24" x 24" x 2" (609.6mm x 609.6mm x 50.8mm)
task_1_feedback.materials: Expected: Aluminum, Plastic, Found: Aluminum frame, MERV 13 rated filter media, polyester backing, galvanized steel wire mesh support
task_1_feedback.performance_criteria: Expected: Intel i7 processor, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD, 15.6-inch display, Found: Minimum efficiency reporting value (MERV) of 13, pressure drop not to exceed 0.35 inches w.g. at 500 FPM, minimum dust holding capacity of 180g, temperature resistance up to 200°F (93.3°C), humidity resistance up to 100% RH
task_1_feedback.additional_requirements: Expected: Must include a backlit keyboard, Wi-Fi 6 support, and a minimum battery life of 10 hours., Found: Must comply with ASHRAE 52.2 standards, UL 900 Class 2 fire rating, antimicrobial treatment to prevent mold growth, individually sealed in plastic packaging with clear labeling of specifications, minimum service life of 3 months under standard operating conditions

task_2_feedback.issue_description: Expected: The dimensions are missing units., Found: Ambiguous material specifications for the product casing
task_2_feedback.suggested_correction: Expected: Add 'cm' to the dimensions to specify the units., Found: Specify exact material composition with grade (e.g., 'ABS plastic' should be changed to 'ABS plastic, UL94V-0 flame retardant grade') and minimum thickness requirements (e.g., '2.5mm ± 0.1mm wall thickness')

task_2_feedback.issue_description: Expected: The material list is incomplete., Found: Missing critical performance parameters for electrical components
task_2_feedback.suggested_correction: Expected: Include all materials such as 'Aluminum, Plastic, Glass'., Found: Add specific electrical requirements including input voltage range (100-240V AC), operating current (maximum 2.5A), power consumption (45W typical, 60W maximum), and required safety certifications (UL, CE, RoHS)

task_2_feedback.issue_description: Expected: Performance criteria lack specific processor model., Found: Inadequate quality control and testing requirements
task_2_feedback.suggested_correction: Expected: Specify the processor model, e.g., 'Intel i7-1165G7'., Found: Include detailed QC protocols: 100% functional testing before shipping, minimum 24-hour burn-in period, drop test requirements (survive 1m drop on concrete surface), and IP54 water/dust resistance testing methodology

task_2_feedback.issue_description: Expected: Additional requirements do not mention operating system compatibility., Found: Vague packaging and shipping specifications
task_2_feedback.suggested_correction: Expected: Add 'Must be compatible with Windows 10 and Linux'., Found: Define exact packaging requirements: individual units in anti-static bags, foam inserts with minimum 1" thickness on all sides, double-wall corrugated cartons (minimum 275# burst strength), maximum carton weight of 40 lbs, and palletized shipping with stretch wrap and corner protectors
